TopicTitle: [QUESTION] What is your opinion on KerbalX?

Articles.Content: Found this website http://www.kerbalx.com about six weeks ago and was wondering what everyone thought about it. Is it a great way to share craft or is there another site you feel is better?
I like it, but then I am biased because it is run by my forum-friend Katateochi.
its the only place to find crafts easy and with a focus on detail and easy to manage if you have your own crafts. its the kerbalstuff of craft files.
Now that i know it exists i like it lol
